beforeAddLiquidity(address,(address,addr.details: Prevents blacklisted addresses from providing liquidity

beforeSwap(address,(address,address,uint.details: Blocks blacklisted addresses, enforces protocol pause, and applies ENS profiles

afterSwap(address,(address,address,uint2.notice: Post-swap processing for monitoring and alerts

ensSecurityProfile().notice: ENS Security Profile contract for reading user preferences

setENSSecurityProfile(address).notice: Set ENS Security Profile contract address
